===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=にょらい}} {{m|ltc|如來|tr={{IPAchar|/njo loj/}}}}, an abbreviation of either {{m|ltc|如去如來}} or {{m|ltc|如來如去||coming from suchness, going back into suchness}}, translations of {{etyl|sa|ja|sort=にょらい'}} {{m|sa|तथागत|tr=tathāgata||coming from suchness, going back into suchness; thus coming, thus going|pos=exact meaning uncertain, see {{pedia|Tathāgata}}}}<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>.
